oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Beverly Hillbillies cast with Chief Kemp and others, Nashville, Tennessee, between 1963 and 1972
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured: Two celebrities of the TV show “The Beverly Hillbillies,” i.e. Buddy Ebsen (tall man in back wearing hat, who played Uncle Jed) and Irene Ryan (petite woman in long skirt, wearing glasses, who played Granny), next to Hubert Otis Kemp. Other people are seen in this group photo, though unidentified. Kemp was the first Chief of the Metro Nashville Police Department from 1963 to 1972. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 35 mm slide, filmstrip : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ryan, Irene; Ebsen, Buddy, 1908-2003; Kemp, Hubert Otis, 1908-1992
